DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine three delivery system vaginal diazepam best systemic absorption , measure serum diazepam level . The three delivery system : moisten tablet , suppository cream . Additionally study compare side effect absorption vaginal diazepam oral diazepam . Vaginal diazepam use off-label vaginally relax pelvic floor muscle reduce pelvic pain caused pelvic floor dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Absorption Vaginal Diazepam Using Different Delivery Systems
DOC.criteria: Provide inform consent Premenopausal woman > age 18 Able provide urine serum sample time period Current use benzodiazepine form . If history benzodiazepine use , must take one week prior study screen enrollment Pregnancy Concomitant use narcotic drug , ethanol , illicit drug use study period could deem unsafe combination benzodiazepine medication use judge investigator .
